text: @realDonaldTrump I couldn’t believe such nonsense. European citizens don’t have  to pay nor a cent for their treatment or a surgery at a Hospital. All over the EU. Our Health Services cover everything using our taxes, even now with the COVID19. Healthcare free for everybody is a  real Victory,

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
